00012 // constants
00013 const double k_pi = 3.1415926535897932;         // pi
00014 const double k_twopi = 6.2831853071795864;      // 2 * pi

00017 // statics and globals
00018 static long                     initialized = false;
00019 static t_hashtab        *hash_modules = NULL;                   // a hashtab of all modules (jcom.hubs) currently instantiated
00020 t_object                        *obj_jamoma_clock = NULL;               // there is only one master clock for the whole system
00021 t_object                        *obj_jamoma_scheduler = NULL;   // a shared global instance of the scheduler class (there may be others too)
00022 bool                            max5 = false;

00025 /************************************************************************************/
00026 // Init the framework
00027 
00028 void jamoma_init(void)
00029 {
00030         if(!initialized){
00031                 t_object        *max = gensym("max")->s_thing;
00032                 t_symbol        *meth = gensym("objectfile");
00033         
00034                 if(maxversion() >= 0x0500)
00035                         max5 = true;
00036                 common_symbols_init();
00037                 jamomaSymbolsInit();
00038                 jamoma_clock_initclass();
00039                 jamoma_scheduler_initclass();
00040                 receivemaster_initclass();
00041                 receive_initclass();
00042                 send_initclass();
00043                 
00044                 // Setup Class Aliases for TTBlue
00045                 object_method(max, meth, gensym("jcom.limiter~"), gensym("tt.limiter~"), gensym("jcom.limiter~"));
00046                 object_method(max, meth, gensym("jcom.saturation~"), gensym("tt.overdrive~"), gensym("jcom.saturation~"));
00047                 
00048                 // Create Required Global Instances
00049                 obj_jamoma_clock = (t_object*)object_new_typed(CLASS_NOBOX, gensym("jamoma.clock"), 0, NULL);
00050                 obj_jamoma_scheduler = (t_object*)object_new_typed(CLASS_NOBOX, gensym("jamoma.scheduler"), 0, NULL);
00051                 hash_modules = (t_hashtab*)hashtab_new(0);
00052 
00053                 post("Jamoma %s - www.jamoma.org", JAMOMA_VERSION);
00054                 initialized = true;
00055         }
00056 }
00057 
00058 
00059 t_max_err jamoma_hub_register(t_symbol *name, t_object *hub)
00060 {
00061         t_object *test = NULL;
00062         
00063         hashtab_lookup(hash_modules, name, &test);
00064         if(test)
00065                 return MAX_ERR_GENERIC;
00066         else{
00067                 hashtab_store(hash_modules, name, hub);
00068                 return MAX_ERR_NONE;
00069         }
00070 }
00071 
00072 
00073 void jamoma_hub_remove(t_symbol *name)
00074 {
00075         hashtab_chuckkey(hash_modules, name);
00076 }
00077 
00078 
00079 t_object* jamoma_get_hub_for_module_named(t_symbol *name)
00080 {
00081         t_object *hub = NULL;
00082         
00083         hashtab_lookup(hash_modules, name, &hub);
00084         return hub;
00085 }

00088 void jamoma_get_all_module_names(long *numModules, t_symbol ***moduleNames)
00089 {
00090         hashtab_getkeys(hash_modules, numModules, moduleNames);

00094 t_object* jamoma_object_getpatcher(t_object *obj)
00095 {
00096         t_object *patcher = NULL;
00097         
00098         if(max5)
00099                 object_obex_lookup(obj, gensym("#P"), &patcher);
00100         else
00101                 patcher = (t_object*)gensym("#P")->s_thing;
00102         return patcher;
00103 }
00104 
00105 
00106 t_symbol *jamoma_patcher_getcontext(t_object *patcher)
00107 {
00108         if(max5){
00109                 t_object        *box = object_attr_getobj(patcher, ps_box);
00110                 t_symbol        *objclass = NULL;
00111                 
00112                 if(box)
00113                         objclass = object_classname(box);
00114                 
00115                 if(objclass == gensym("bpatcher"))
00116                         return objclass;
00117                 else if(objclass == gensym("newobj"))
00118                         return gensym("subpatcher");
00119                 else
00120                         return gensym("toplevel");
00121 
00122                 return _sym_nothing;
00123         }
00124         else{
00125                 t_patcher       *p = (t_patcher*)patcher;
00126                 t_box           *box = p->p_box;
00127 
00128                 if(p->p_vnewobj != NULL){
00129                         box = (t_box *)p->p_vnewobj;
00130                         if(ob_sym(box) == gensym("bpatcher"))
00131                                 return gensym("bpatcher");
00132                         else
00133                                 return gensym("subpatcher");
00134                 }
00135                 else
00136                         return gensym("toplevel");
00137         }
00138 }
00139 
00140 
00141 typedef struct bpatcher {
00142         t_box b_box;
00143         short a,b;
00144         short c,d;
00145         short e,f;
00146         short g,h;
00147         short i,j;
00148         short k,l;
00149         short m,n;
00150         short o;
00151         Symbol *b_name;
00152         Atom b_argv[10];
00153         short b_argc;
00154 } t_bpatcher;

00157 // Don't pass memory in for this function!  It will allocate what it needs
00158 // -- then the caller is responsible for freeing
00159 void jamoma_patcher_getargs(t_object *patcher, long *argc, t_atom **argv)
00160 {
00161         if(max5){
00162                 t_symbol                *context = jamoma_patcher_getcontext(patcher);
00163                 t_object                *box = object_attr_getobj(patcher, ps_box);
00164                 t_object                *textfield = NULL;
00165                 char                    *text = NULL;
00166                 unsigned long   textlen = 0;
00167 
00168                 if(context == gensym("bpatcher"))
00169                         object_attr_getvalueof(box, gensym("args"), argc, argv);
00170                 else if(context == gensym("subpatcher")){
00171                         textfield = object_attr_getobj(box, gensym("textfield"));
00172                         object_method(textfield, gensym("gettextptr"), &text, &textlen);
00173                         atom_setparse(argc, argv, text);
00174                 }
00175                 else{
00176                         *argc = 0;
00177                         *argv = NULL;
00178                 }
00179         }
00180         else{
00181                 t_patcher       *p = (t_patcher*)patcher;
00182                 t_symbol        *context = jamoma_patcher_getcontext(patcher);
00183                 t_bpatcher      *bp;
00184                 t_box           *box = (t_box *)p->p_vnewobj;
00185                 t_atombuf       *atoms = NULL;
00186                 long            ac = 0;
00187                 t_atom          *av = NULL;
00188 
00189                 if(context == gensym("bpatcher")){
00190                         box = (t_box *)p->p_vnewobj;
00191                         bp = (t_bpatcher *)box;
00192                         
00193                         ac = bp->b_argc;
00194                         av = bp->b_argv;
00195                 }
00196                 else if(context == gensym("subpatcher")){
00197                         atoms = (t_atombuf *)box->b_binbuf;
00198                         ac = atoms->a_argc - 1;
00199                         av = atoms->a_argv + 1;
00200                 }
00201                 
00202                 if(ac && av){
00203                         *argc = ac;
00204                         *argv = (t_atom*)sysmem_newptr(sizeof(t_atom) * ac);
00205                         sysmem_copyptr(av, *argv, sizeof(t_atom) * ac);
00206                 }
00207                 else{
00208                         *argc = 0;
00209                         *argv = NULL;
00210                 }
00211         }
00212 }

00214 
00215 t_symbol* jamoma_patcher_getvarname(t_object *patcher)
00216 {
00217         if(max5){
00218                 return _sym_nothing;
00219         }
00220         else{
00221                 t_patcher       *p = (t_patcher*)patcher;
00222                 t_box           *box = (t_box *)p->p_vnewobj;
00223                 t_symbol        *s = _sym_nothing;
00224                 
00225                 if(!box)
00226                         return _sym_nothing;
00227                         
00228                 p = box->b_patcher;     
00229                 if(patcher_boxname(p, box, &s))
00230                         return s;
00231                 else
00232                         return _sym_nothing;
00233         }
00234 }

00240 {
00241         jamoma_clock_dsp(NULL, sp, count);
00242 }

00245 // This is the default attribute getter for Jamoma's core
00246 // It sends the data out not only the parameter dumpout, but also
00247 // out the feedback outlet from the module
00248 // for example:
00249 //      jamoma_class_attr_new(c, "ramp/drive", _sym_symbol, (method)param_setramp, 
00250 //              calcoffset(t_param, attr_ramp));
00251 void jamoma_class_attr_new(t_class *c, char *attrName, t_symbol *attrType, method setter, method getter, long offset)
00252 {
00253         t_object        *attr = NULL;
00254         char            getterName[256];
00255         
00256         strcpy(getterName, attrName);
00257         strcat(getterName, "/get");
00258 
00259         attr = attr_offset_new(attrName, attrType, 0, getter, setter, offset);
00260         class_addattr(c, attr);
00261 
00262         class_addmethod(c, (method)jamoma_class_attr_get, getterName, A_GIMME, 0);
00263 }
00264 
00265 
00266 void jamoma_class_attr_array_new(t_class *c, char *attrName, t_symbol *attrType, long list_size, method setter, method getter, long sizeOffset, long offset)
00267 {
00268         t_object        *attr = NULL;
00269         char            getterName[256];
00270         
00271         strcpy(getterName, attrName);
00272         strcat(getterName, "/get");
00273 
00274         attr = attr_offset_array_new(attrName, _sym_atom, list_size, 0, getter, setter, sizeOffset, offset);
00275         class_addattr(c, attr);
00276 
00277         class_addmethod(c, (method)jamoma_class_attr_get, getterName, A_GIMME, 0);
00278 }
00279 
00280 
00281 void jamoma_class_attr_get(t_object *o, t_symbol *attrName, long, t_atom *)
00282 {
00283         char            cAttrName[256];
00284         t_symbol        *sAttrName;
00285         char            *temp;
00286         long            ac = 0;
00287         t_atom          *av = NULL;
00288         t_jcom_core_subscriber_common *x = (t_jcom_core_subscriber_common*)o;
00289         
00290         strcpy(cAttrName, attrName->s_name);
00291         temp = strrchr(cAttrName, '/');
00292         if(temp)
00293                 *temp = 0;
00294         sAttrName = gensym(cAttrName);
00295 
00296         object_attr_getvalueof(o, sAttrName, &ac, &av);
00297         object_obex_dumpout(o, sAttrName, ac, av);
00298         if(x->hub != NULL){
00299 //              t_symbol        *attrName = (t_symbol *)object_method((t_object *)attr, gensym("getname"));
00300                 char            s[256];
00301                 t_atom          a[4];
00302         
00303                 sprintf(s, "%s:/%s", x->attr_name->s_name, attrName->s_name);
00304                 atom_setsym(a+0, gensym(s));
00305                 sysmem_copyptr(av, a+1, sizeof(t_atom) * ac);
00306                 object_method_typed(x->hub, ps_feedback, ac + 1, a, NULL);
00307         }
00308 
00309         if(ac)
00310                 sysmem_freeptr(av);
00311 }
